net.floodlightcontroller.routing

类 ForwardingBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.routing.ForwardingBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IListener<org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFType>, IOFMessageListener
    直接已知子类:
    Forwarding

    public abstract class ForwardingBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOFMessageListener
    Abstract base class for implementing a forwarding module. Forwarding is responsible for programming flows to a switch in response to a policy decision.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • processPacketInMessage

        public abstract IListener.Command processPacketInMessage(IOFSwitch sw,
                                                         org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn pi,
                                                         IRoutingDecision decision,
                                                         FloodlightContext cntx)
        All subclasses must define this function if they want any specific forwarding action
        参数:
        sw - Switch that the packet came in from
        pi - The packet that came in
        decision - Any decision made by a policy engine

      • receive

        public IListener.Command receive(IOFSwitch sw,
                                 org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage msg,
                                 FloodlightContext cntx)
        从接口复制的说明: IOFMessageListener
        This is the method Floodlight uses to call listeners with OpenFlow messages
        指定者:
        receive 在接口中 IOFMessageListener
        参数:
        sw - the OpenFlow switch that sent this message
        msg - the message
        cntx - a Floodlight message context object you can use to pass information between listeners
        返回:
        the command to continue or stop the execution

      • pushRoute

        public boolean pushRoute(Path route,
                         org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.match.Match match,
                         org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn pi,
                         org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId pinSwitch,
                         org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie,
                         FloodlightContext cntx,
                         boolean requestFlowRemovedNotification,
                         org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFlowModCommand flowModCommand)
        Push routes from back to front
        参数:
        route - Route to push
        match - OpenFlow fields to match on
        srcSwPort - Source switch port for the first hop
        dstSwPort - Destination switch port for final hop
        cookie - The cookie to set in each flow_mod
        cntx - The floodlight context
        requestFlowRemovedNotification - if set to true then the switch would send a flow mod removal notification when the flow mod expires
        flowModCommand - flow mod. command to use, e.g. OFFlowMod.OFPFC_ADD, OFFlowMod.OFPFC_MODIFY etc.
        返回:
        true if a packet out was sent on the first-hop switch of this route

      • pushPacket

        protected void pushPacket(IOFSwitch sw,
                          org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn pi,
                          org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort outport,
                          boolean useBufferedPacket,
                          FloodlightContext cntx)
        Pushes a packet-out to a switch. The assumption here is that the packet-in was also generated from the same switch. Thus, if the input port of the packet-in and the outport are the same, the function will not push the packet-out.
        参数:
        sw - switch that generated the packet-in, and from which packet-out is sent
        pi - packet-in
        outport - output port
        useBufferedPacket - use the packet buffered at the switch, if possible
        cntx - context of the packet

      • packetOutMultiPort

        public void packetOutMultiPort(byte[] packetData,
                               IOFSwitch sw,
                               org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort inPort,
                               java.util.Set<org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort> outPorts,
                               FloodlightContext cntx)
        Write packetout message to sw with output actions to one or more output ports with inPort/outPorts passed in.
        参数:
        packetData -
        sw -
        inPort -
        ports -
        cntx -

      • packetOutMultiPort

        public void packetOutMultiPort(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn pi,
                               IOFSwitch sw,

        另请参阅:

      • isCallbackOrderingPrereq

        public boolean isCallbackOrderingPrereq(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFType type,
                                        java.lang.String name)
        从接口复制的说明: IListener
        Check if the module called name is a callback ordering prerequisite for this module. In other words, if this function returns true for the given name, then this listener will be called after that message listener.
        指定者:
        isCallbackOrderingPrereq 在接口中 IListener<org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFType>
        参数:
        type - the object type to which this applies
        name - the name of the module
        返回:
        whether name is a prerequisite.

      • isCallbackOrderingPostreq

        public boolean isCallbackOrderingPostreq(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFType type,
                                         java.lang.String name)
        从接口复制的说明: IListener
        Check if the module called name is a callback ordering post-requisite for this module. In other words, if this function returns true for the given name, then this listener will be called before that message listener.
        指定者:
        isCallbackOrderingPostreq 在接口中 IListener<org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFType>
        参数:
        type - the object type to which this applies
        name - the name of the module
        返回:
        whether name is a post-requisite.
